text: The Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD), officially the City of Los Angeles Police Department, is the police department of Los Angeles, California. With 9,974 officers and 3,036 civilian members, it is the third-largest municipal police department in the United States, after the New York City Police Department and the Chicago Police Department. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Los Angeles Category:Law enforcement agencies of the United States
title: Los Angeles Police Department
